title: Exempts cooperative and condominium board members from criminal liability for building and multiple dwelling law violations except where they had knowledge
summary: Exempts cooperative and condominium board members from criminal liability for building, window guard, and multiple dwelling law violations except where they had knowledge that such law, or rule or regulation enacted pursuant thereto was being violated or where they intended to violate the law, rule or regulation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law and the multiple residence law, in relation to defining circumstances for the elimination of condominium and cooperative corporation officer and director criminal liability
